analysis.key_quote: OPM’s decision to open this comment period during [summer recess/holiday season] constitutes deliberate comment suppression, condemned in American Hospital Ass’n v. Bowen (D.C. Cir. 1988) as "procedural gamesmanship."
analysis.rationale: The comment primarily addresses concerns about the timing of the comment period rather than expressing a clear stance for or against the proposed rule. It focuses on procedural issues without discussing the merits or implications of the Schedule F rule.
